title: TAG! and dodge ball?
body:
Why not? you can only tag with your abilities, and if one person from one team is tug then their team is it and vice versa.
no targeted abilies (sorry guys looks like ryze is illegal)
game ends at 30:00 and the team who was it at the time loses
played on the dominion map.
10 second grace after team it swap

dodge ball
Sort of the same thing but on summoners rift.
people stand in the areas on either side of mid lane and cant cross the minion paths
no targeted abilities or basic attacks to tag out
if you get hit with a skill shot (or an arc hit from say stattik shiv ect) then you go out
if a teammate gets 10 minion kills or themselves out then you go back in 
(everyone has to stand in single file after landing in fountain so proper turns are taken)
If one team has no active players in mid lane then they lose
P.S you have to recall after getting hit even if another player gets hit immediately after
10 second grace after reaching mid lane or tagging out someone (however you cant tag out other players)

replies.body: Dodgeball has already been created, it's at baron pit with a wardline, and it's a skillshot fight to the death. I'm pretty sure there's a post on the rules somewhere on Reddit or NA forums. As for tag it sounds interesting and original.
I know it has been made before, but that is my variation on dodge ball
